turns.text: I just moved. How long do I have to update my address?
You have 10 days to update your address.
You have not updated to your current address?
Not yet, but it's only been 5 days.
Are there costs associated with traffic points?
Yes, the DRA charge is based on the number of points you have accumulated.
Are there any common mistakes people make with the DMV?
Yes, there are several common issues people have that could have been easily fixed beforehand.
Are there consequences for simple mistakes?
Yes, anything up to an impounded vehicle or encounters with law enforcement officers.
What happens if my insurance lapses?
Your license and registration will be suspended.
Will that happen automatically, or will I get a chance to reinstate my coverage first?
You will be sent an inquiry letter first, then if it isn't resolved your registration will be suspended.
Can you tell me how I will know if my application has been accepted?
Sure, we will have to review your application first.
We will let you know if it is not complete.
I believe it has all been filled out.
We will send your application back with what is wrong and give more instructions on what to do if something else is needed.
How do I pay for the DIAL-IN Search account fees?
You will pay those fees once we accept your application.
How do I know if there are fees for using a DIAL-IN search account?

Some organizations are exempt from search fees. Any public organization , its officers , a volunteer fire company , a volunteer ambulance service , or a legal aid bureau or society or other private entity acting pursuant to section 722 of the New York State County Law , that makes a search for a public purpose, is exempt from the search fees.
How do I know if it's a public organization?
For more information, please visit our Escrow Accounts page.
How do I apply?
Go to Data Services - New Search Account NYS Dept of Motor Vehicles.
How do I get a motorcycle license?
In order to drive a motorcycle, every New York resident must have a Class M or Class MJ driver license or learner permit which entitles them to drive a motorcycle
What are the steps involved in getting a motorcycle license?
Your first step is to apply for the motorcycle permit at a DMV office
How do I apply for my motorcycle permit at a DMV office?
You must first study the NY State Motorcycle Operator's Manual and prepare yourself for the written test that is involved
Does it make any difference if I already have a New York State permit or driver license?
If you already have this, bring this with you along with a payment of $10.00, which is the application fee
Do I get a motorcycle license directly after applying or are there steps involved?
Firstly, you have to get a motorcycle learner permit. The DMV offers 3 different types of documentation, which are Enhanced, REAL ID and Standard documents
Can I operate a motorcycle in New York if I hold an out-of-state motorcycle license?
Yes, provided you have a valid motorcycle issued by another state where you are resident
I don't have a valid motorcycle license from another state

we need a copy of the posted notice of sales or a copy of the newspaper ad containing the vehicle year , make and VIN [11] the name of the newspaper and the date the ad was published or [12] a statement from the Marshal or Sheriff that they complied with the law in regard to public notification or sale [13] All of these documents [14] a completed Vehicle Registration / Title Application PDF [ 2 ] MV-82 [15] the Marshal 's or Sheriff 's Bill of Sale , [16] which must contain the following [17] a description of the vehicle year , make and VIN [18] the place , [19] date , [20] reason and circumstances of seizure [21] the name and address of the purchaser and the price paid [26] if the vehicle was sold within New York City , [27] a copy of the judgement or execution order giving the Marshal or Sheriff authority to sell the vehicle [28] if the vehicle was sold within New York City , [29] a statement by the Marshal or Sheriff that they had notified or attempted to notify the owner and lienholder that the vehicle was being auctioned [30] the current NY State Insurance ID card auto liability insurance 1 [31] your NY State driver license , [32] permit , [33] non - [34] driver ID , [35] or other proof of identity 2 [36] Payment for fees and taxes or proof of an exemption [ 3 ] [37] If you register for a business or organization , [38] also bring proof of incorporation .3

we accept cash, personal check or money order and most credit , pinless debit or prepaid cards American Express , Discover Card / Novus , MasterCard , VISA

How do I replace my license when overseas?
To do that please submit a completed Application for Permit, Driver License or Non - Driver ID Card PDF MV-44
I want more info on self-certification?
Do you want to self-certify?
Yes

New federal regulations require all commercial drivers to certify to the Department of Motor Vehicles DMV the type of driving they perform or expect to perform. Drivers that self - certify to a non - excepted driving type NA or NI are also required to submit a copy of their USDOT Medical Examiner s Certificate
Do I need to provide a Medical Examiner s Certificate if I work for the school system?
Do you operate in an excepted operation such as a school for a private service?
Yes
You can choose EI instead of Medical Examiners Cerificate in that case
Does it include field trips?

School operation is defined as " school to home / home to school " operation and includes interstate operation for school operation only. This does not include field trips. Only applicants employed by a municipality can drive for out - of - state field trips
What driving type should I certify to if I have a valid DOT medical examiners certifcate?
ou should certify to the type of driving in which you operate or expect to operate and your CDL will have the restrictions for that driving type
Are you capable of obtaining a Medical Examiner s Certificate?
Yes
The NI driving type will allow for the broadest commercial operation capability with no license restrictions applied
Is anything else required?
You will need to have the appropriate restrictions added to your driver s license A3 and/or K
I have a query in relation to the Driver Violation Point System, what exactly is it and how does it operate?
The Driver Violation Point System is a way for the DMV to highlight high risk drivers and allocate points for certain traffic violations that may occur
Do you have any points from this Driver Violation Point System?
Yes I do, what is the maximum number of points that I am allowed accrue?

If you receive 11 points in any 18-month period, you r driver license can be suspended. This is not the only was that your license can be suspended, consult the Suspensions and Revocations section of the website
Could you tell me some more about the Point and Insurance Reduction Program?
The Point and Insurance Reduction Program is DMV approved, which ultimately helps prevent you from losing your license, should you have accrued 11 points or more on your license
When are points not assigned in the NYS Driver Point System?
Instances where points are not assigned are associated with violations relating to bicycles, pedestrians or parking
How are the total number of points on my license calculated?

A conviction of a traffic violation has to occur before points accrue on your license. Your points total is calculated based on when you received the violation, not the date of conviction. Points are calculated on any violations that occurred within the last 18 months and are added together to give a total
I want information about how to surrender a an IRP registration please.
The reason for surrender is because you do not want to renew your registration?
No, that is not the reason.

Yes but if you do not surrender your apportioned plates, you will be charged a registration fee for the entire year.
Where should I sendthe surrendered items?
You must send it to International Registration Bureau, PO Box 2850, Albany, NY, 12220-0850.
How to get a refund from the New York state portion of the IRP registration fees I paid to other jurisdictions?
You may request that refound only if the other jurisdiction made an error and the error is on your invoice and/or you paid duplicate apportioned registration fees for the same vehicle.
One of my apportioned plates was stolen, what should I do?

Fill the form "Report of Lost or Stolen Motor Vehicle Items MV-78B from a police agency and send form MV-78B with form IRP-6 Surrender the apportioned plates only if no vehicle will replace the current vehicle.

Can I change the address online?

You must have a valid NY State Certified Vehicle Escort Card MV-64. You must carry the MV-64 card with your driver license when you drive an escort vehicle in NY State. These are loads with a width that exceeds 12 feet , and/or length of 80 feet or greater , and/or a height of 14 feet or greater
Are Escort driver certifications mandatory?

No if you escort an over - dimensional load that is less than the requirement stated in footnote # 1 or you are a member of the military and escort military convoys or you escort state governmental vehicles

If there is any damage, you will need to contact your insurance company.

Report it to both the police and your insurance company immediately.

yes there was.

how long is the hearig process?
you will be back in business after complete compliance .

you have 60 days from the date of the ALJs decision to file the Appeal From DMV Hearing Determination PDF [ 2 ] AA-33A , which must be accompanied by the appropriate filing fee
can I request a hearing?
you may be offered the opportunity through a " hearing waiver " to admit to the charges and to either pay a specified monetary penalty and/or to accept a suspension

you may be offered the opportunity through a " hearing waiver " to admit to the charges and to either pay a specified monetary penalty and/or to accept a suspension
I was just wondering if i need insurance to register my vehicle?
yes, the DMV requires you to have insurance in order to register your vehicle.
would you like me to tell you some more information?

sure. When you get insurance there are 2 ways that your insurance company will provide you with in order to provide you with proof that your insurance has been accepted. Is there anywhere that I can view copies of DMV records and if so, when can I do this?

After 20 business days of the receipt of the FOIL Office's written acknowledgement of your request, most DMV records are available for viewing, these records can rarely be produced on the day that they are requested
Can I be contacted by phone if I provided a number with my request?
When the requested records are ready to be viewed, the FOIL office will call you. Otherwise, you will be notified by mail
In the event that I am unhappy with the DMV's response to my FIOL request, can I appeal this?
Yes, if the DMV has denied your request completely or partially
How do I appeal it?
You must appeal in writing within 30 days of the denial of your FOIL request. This appeal has to identify the date of your record request and a description of the denial

I would like to know whether I can buy information on driver license and vehicle from DMV.
Yes. You can buy the information through contract sales, pay - per - search and over - the - counter.
Can you tell me more about the contract sales method?

Through contract sales method, DMV sells the information for every two years by an open procurement process. The successful bidders must follow the limitation that comes with the information so that the information will not be misused.
Does motor vehicle manufacturers also use the information shared by DMV?
Yes and it is a good example how the sharing programs play a critical role in improving public safety and make our life more convenient.
What else the benefits of the shared information?

Bus companies could check their bus drivers and confirm their ability to safely drive the school bus. Employers could check their workers records to be aware of anything suspicious that might cause safety problems and there are many more examples on how the shared information benefits our daily life.
Without the shared information, traffic safety and commerce would also be impacted negatively.
I never thought that it can also have impact on commerce.
Could I access the data for DPPA purposes?
Yes you may access it through pay - per - search service for a legitimate DPPA purposes. However, you must also sign an agreement identifying that the purpose is permissible under the DPPA.
What happens when an insurance company could not use the shared information programs?

When insurance companies could not conduct these searches, you will have to go through long and complicated process just to have a quote given to you. In addition, you will also unable to shop for affordable rates and there would be a potential increase in fraud and unreliable driver records.
